text:
@seanhannity It was self evident @SpeakerPelosi that the speach you tore up the POTUS Donald Trump talked about the Chinese Corona Virus.

It was self evident that you pursued impeachment as your priority and not the Chinese COVID-19 virus. 

You are a sham.
The Democrats are a sham.
